There were no other sightings in Hayward on or around June 24th 2012
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: Saw object very slowly move up and away/out of sight.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt a driving range in town with a friend when I noticed and pointed out a small object in distance, high in sky. The object had no apparant features, but clearly was not a conventional aircraft as we were in flight path of 3 different major airports and at one point a passenger jet passed through our line of sight of the object giving us a clear comparison. The object appeared to be very high, very slow moving and eventually we just lost sight of it. Was one of 3 seperate unknown sighting within a 48 hour period within a 100mile radius.
